name: Itkron Pungkiatrussamee
description: '''Itkron Pungkiatrussamee''' ({{langx|th|อิชณน์กร พึ่งเกียรติรัศมี}}; born November 15, 1991), also familiarly known as '''Jaii TaitosmitH''' is a Thai musician, singer, guitarist, actor. He rose to fame as the lead singer of [[Thai rock|rock band]] [[TaitosmitH]], and lead actor in several [[Thai film|film]]s.
